title: Unlocking Insights into Business Trajectories with Transformer-based Spatio-temporal Data Analysis. (arXiv:2306.10034v1 [cs.IR])
abstract: The world of business is constantly evolving and staying ahead of the curve requires a deep understanding of market trends and performance. This article addresses this requirement by modeling business trajectories using news articles data.
context:
Title: Unlocking Insights into Business Trajectories with Transformer-based Spatio-temporal Data Analysis. (arXiv:2306.10034v1 [cs.IR])
Abstract: The world of business is constantly evolving and staying ahead of the curve requires a deep understanding of market trends and performance. This article addresses this requirement by modeling business trajectories using news articles data.
translated_title: 基于Transformer的时空数据分析在揭示商业轨迹方面的应用研究
translated_abstract: 商业世界持续发展，保持领先需要深入理解市场趋势和业绩。本文通过模拟商业轨迹，利用新闻文章数据来满足这一需求。
tldr: 本研究利用新闻文章数据，采用Transformer模型模拟商业轨迹，揭示商业趋势和行业表现。
en_tdlr: This study uses news article data and Transformer model to simulate business trajectories, revealing business trends and industry performance.
